channel.title: How do i get items like party hats
channel.description: I just made a new server and i odnt know how to get items can somoene plz tell me how to do it :confused:

item.title: How do i get items like party hats
item.dc:creator: @Stone_Sour Stone Sour
item.description:
@Stone_Sour wrote:

Ok here my little guide:

First go to ‘help’ located at the top of you Mopar server screen. Then click Item Id’s. After that you can just type in the item you want and click serch and it will give you the Id’s.(ex: Dragon med (1150) ) Type: ::item 1150. and that should spawn it. if you want noted look at the SECOND item id of the item you want and type: ::pickup 1150 (amount). That will give you how much of items you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get items like party hats
